channel.title: Summoning tab
channel.description:
Problem: [IMG]http://i159.photobucket.com/albums/t123/jcrane164/idk.jpg[/img]
Alright the orange border is one of my problems and it is when i searched my entire server and client codes for the text and cannot find it and i wanted to change "Farming" i know you cant just search for farming it is more complicated so if you could help me with that one please do.
The red border is where i need help making an entire new skill box instead of replacing farming because i need the skill farming, thanks if you can help
P.S If you cant help me make a new skill tab for summoning is there a way i could make all account have 0 farming exp? Then replace summoning so they have to start at 1?
[size=10pt][b] FEEDBACK PLEASE[/b][/size]

item.title: Summoning tab
item.dc:creator: @skittle385 skittle385
item.description:
@skittle385 wrote:

oh thats easy but idk if u have a 508, but for 317’s just go to texthandler.java then search for farming then change it to summoning

Read full topic
